p: To study in vivo the physiological relevance of the identified CHIKV CP 17-25 ligand, HLA class I-B*07:02 transgenic mice were infected by the i.p route for 7 days with rVACV-CHIKV. Later, a physiological measurement of the functional ex vivo activity of T cells against this viral ligand was carried out. Spleen cells of infected mice specifically recognized cells that were pulsed with the CHIKV CP 17-25 peptide ( Fig 3, upper panel).
